Meet us in the wild

We love, love, love going to, organizing and sponsoring events for Java/Scala community in Poland and elsewhere. You can meet us at listed events, talk to us about technologies, company or business. There’s many occasions to poke us.

We are speakers

You know what they say - speech is silver, silence is golden, but we believe that speaking at conferences is priceless! We still have much to say :-)

We are organizers

Proud of our work for others. Proud of Scalar - pivotal conference for us and Scala community - the largest in Central Europe. How much are we involved in events organizing? - find it out.

Scalar conference info

Latest from Scalar blog
conference talks

Scalar mini

Scalar multiplication gave us Scalar Mini. Best programmers; deep knowledge and current tech trends in light formula of mini conference. In cooperation of local community and allegro Tech we’re organizing Scalar Mini since 2005. Just can’t get enough!

We sponsor and (co-)organize
